column1: #text=Last week , I went to Supercuts for a haircut .
#text=There were only two people in the waiting area , so I assumed that I would n't have to wait long .
#text=However , Supercuts has an option where you can phone in ahead of your arrival and get on the waiting list and apparently several people had done this .
#text=After about an hour and a half , I was called back .
#text=I sat in a chair and the girl asked me how I wanted my hair cut .
#text=I told her that I wanted it cut behind my ears and about two inches off the length all over .
#text=She covered me with a plastic sheet up to my neck , took a spray bottle and wet my hair down , combed it through , and began cutting .
#text=She started by trimming around my ears so that they were exposed .
#text=Next , she took her comb and grabbed a hand full of hair on the top of my head .
#text=She combed it straight up with one hand while following the comb with my hair between two fingers of her other hand , stopping about two inches short of the ends .
#text=She took her scissors and snipped the top two inches of my hair and then grabbed an adjacent handful of hair and repeated this action .
#text=She did this until she had gone over my entire head .
#text=During all of this , we chatted about the weather , what kind of food we liked , and some other trivial , but interesting things .
#text=Finally , she combed my hair down into the style that I had when I sat down and asked me how it looked . ''
#text=She removed the plastic sheet and brushed me off and we headed to the cash register .
#text=She rang me up on the register and I swiped my credit card , leaving a tip in the process .
#text=We each told the other to '' `` Have a good day '' '' and I headed out the door .
